fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use an Ability from a dead Townie.
- Revive a Townie from the graveyard. (1 use)
- With the Retrinomicon, use an Ability from any dead role. (2 uses)
- With the Retrinomicon, summon a spirit of light to Astrally attack a player.
- While dead, Seance with a Player during the day, Opening a chat with them, it will close at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock and Redirect Immune
- You are given the Retrinomicon at the beginning of night 3.
- You cannot use an ability from the same dead player twice.
- You may only Seance while dead, You may revive while dead, You may revive yourself.
